sentence.Network_en: Commonly used matrix has turfy earth, coconut tree branny, pearlite , vermiculite, mix commonly use.
sentence.Network_cn: 常用的基质有泥炭土.椰糠.珍珠岩. 蛭石, 一般混合使用.

sentence.Network_en: Turfy not too fine, pearlite grain diameter 3 - 4 millimeter, vermiculite grain diameter 3 - 5 millimeter are idealer.
sentence.Network_cn: 泥炭不要太细, 珍珠岩颗粒直径 3-4 毫米, 蛭石颗粒直径 3-5 毫米比较理想.
